attributes.review:
I saw a similar review that shared a similar experience with me, but basically this app will get into your emails and inevitably DESTROY your phone. As trump supporters, we must unite using the technology we have and support the man that will make this country great again. We can’t do that when our phones are destroyed, now can we? From a trump supporter to you, MAKE AMERICA GREAT AGAIN!! 

TRUMP 2020 🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸
attributes.title: PLEASE DON’T DOWNLOAD THIS FELLOW TRUMP SUPPORTERS!!

attributes.review:
i downloaded this app in hopes of further connecting myself to our lord, mr trump. unfortunately the only thing i am now connected to is twelve different illegal pornography websites, my phone is now glitching and working very slowly, i believe i have gotten some sort of virus from this app. i don’t understand how someone as good and innocent as our courageous leader could have connections to porn websites but it does scare me. i hope he will bring this issue up in one of his many important tweets, this is a terrible issue that is negatively impacting each and everyone of us patriotic americans. i asked my friend Susanna if she was having the same problems and hers were even worse, her phone has stopped working completely, she was devastated when this happened because she was in the process of making a purchase from vineyard vines. this just shows that we need to be therefore each other in these devastating times, my heart goes out to all of those who are effected by this horrible situation, we will get through this together. 
~love 
Anneleigh Grace
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: IT TOOK OVER 4 HOURS TO DOWNLOAD NOT TO MENTION AS IT WAS DOWNLOADING I GOT A TEXT FROM “ TRUMP “ SAYING THANKS FOR GETTING THE APP AND THEN ASKED FOR MY PHONE NUMBER LIKE WTH HOW R U TEXTING ME WITHOUT MY PHONE NUMBER?! I JUST LEFT IT ON READ THEN AFTER IT FINISHED DOWNLOADING I WENT ON THE APP AND GOT ANOTHER TEXT SAYING HE WANTED TO GET FREAKY IN THE SHEETS NOT TO MENTION I’M 1 YEARS OLD AT THIS POINT I WAS CRYINGGGG 😭😭😭 SO I JUST LEFT IT ON READ AGAIN THEN I DELETED THE APP N GOT ANITHER TEXT SAYING TO REINSTALL THE APP OR IMMA BE BROKE SO I GOT THE APP BACK N I GOT ANOTHER ANOTHER TEXT SAYING “ TY BBY GIRL 😘 “ N AT THAT POINT I WAS DONE!!! SO I DELETED THE APP AGAIN N GOT ANOTHER TEXT SAYING “ WHY DID U DELETE MY APP AGAIN?! “ SO I JUST BLOCKED THE NUMBER SO MORAL OF THE STORY DON’T PUT UR PHONE IN WATER ☺️

attributes.title: Fellow Trump Supporters

attributes.review:
Hello, I’m a huge trump supporter! I truly believe he will make America great again, or even better than it already is. I downloaded this app to be more involved with my favorite present’s campaign. I really just want to show as much support as I can towards the Trump 2020 campaign! I plan on voting for him again therefore I also downloaded this app to get even more information on the campaign. Unfortunately, not even 10 minutes after I had downloaded this app I got a notification informing me that my credit card had been used to buy the newest IPhone! This obviously wasn’t me so I shut my card down, but this continued to happen even after my bank had dealt with my problem. A day after downloading the app I had discovered that some of my passwords had been leaked. Problems of the sort continued to happen until I took my phone to my local T-Mobile and my assistant informed me it was in fact this app that had assisted these hackers in getting information on me! I still support Trump’s campaign, but I am highly disappointed in him for not fully keeping up with his people’s internet privacy! Thank you for reading! 

(𝓹𝓲𝓪𝓸  𝓹𝓲𝓪𝓸)
attributes.title: Hackers!!!!

attributes.review: Please do not download this app. It destroyed me phone and I have to write this on my Samsung smart fridge.
